snippet: Russian organizers agreed to set up protest zones in Sochi during the Winter Olympics, said Thomas Bach, the International Olympic Committee president.
abstract: Russian organizers agree to set up protest zones in Sochi during the Winter Olympics, in which people can express their opinions or demonstrate.
lead_paragraph: Russian organizers agreed to set up protest zones in Sochi during the Winter Olympics, said Thomas Bach, the International Olympic Committee president.

headline.main: Protest Zones to Be Set Up at Olympics
